feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LON1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 5, 05:00 - 14:00 UTC

Nov 10, 23:02 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/12/2023 05:00 UTC
End time : 05/12/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [EU/CA][VMware Private Cloud] - vRealize Operations (vRops) upgrade
entry.content:
Nov 20, 09:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 16, 00:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/11/2023 09:00 UTC
End time : 23/11/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vRops will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vRealize Operations (vRops).

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage Wave 7
entry.content:
Nov 11, 21:05 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 6, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 31, 21:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/11/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 11/11/2023 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some latency during the operations.
Service improvement : In order to improve our services, we need to free up all the admin or client zpools located on the LV1 and LV2 filers.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Racks R802L22/R802L16/R802R21/R802L24
entry.content:
Nov 8, 08:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 2, 22:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/11/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 22/11/2023 18:00 UTC
Service impact : vMotion will be unavailable for 20 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing an electrical maintenance on racks R802L22, R802L16, R802R21 and R802L24.
